LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up Google authentication:

  • Create new credentials at Google. If not done already, a new project must be created on the Google Cloud Platform beforehand.
  • Click Create credentials > OAuth client ID.
  • Enter the credentials at the bottom of this form.
    • .
  • The URL listed below must be entered at Sign-in credentials > Authorized forwarding URIs.
    • .
  • Activate automatic registration in the shop's customer settings if you want to register externally authorized visitors automatically.
